6.Pros: You get 1 free meal during your shift.
6.Cons: Unprofessional, greedy, and unhealthy. They will try anything they can to get out of paying you for hours you work. In the last pay period, I worked 9 days and only got paid for 8. When I asked for confirmation that the problem had been rectified, my manager jumped down my throat, insulted me, and called me a liar when I told him I did not in fact mean to make him look stupid.

7.Pros: - Free shift meals and half off food when not working there.- Can call out anytime you need to as long as you don't do it last minute.- Relaxed environment.
7.Cons: - Very shady practices, some of which are health concerns.- Depending on location, pay is not equal to the amount of stress caused.- Depending on location, can be very understaffed.

8.Pros: Staff get along well. Hours aren't bad. Easy job to learn.

9.Pros: Free burgers are good to eat.
